name: Dungeons War
description:
YOU NEED TO PLAY ON FULLSCREEN.

How to play:

 You have two actions by turn so you can choose to use your actions by moving*, using your power ups** or skip the turn***. This game is a turn by turn game so when you used your two actions, it's your enemies turn. *To move you need to press the move button in the action shop and then you can choose where to move with w,a,s,d or with the arrows to finaly press enter or right click to move. **Sometime, power ups will fall off the sky and you can pick them up by standing on the same spot. You can use them on the power ups menu. There's two power ups, the 'killer' and the 'adder'. You can use the killer by standing one square beside and pressing the 'killer' button in the power ups menu. The 'adder' will just add all you actions. ***The Skip a turn options will make you skip a turn and add 2 actions to your remaining actions (you have a maximum of 4). 

To win you need to either kill both of your enemies or to capture their trophies. The trophies are in the center of the dungeons. You can go to your enemies dungeons by going througt the colored walls. Watch out because they can kill you by going on the same spot as you. Your trophy is very important and if you stand on it you will actually be protected, you'll see a purple aura. When the purple aura appears, you and your trophy are protected.

This is about it, if you have some questions or comments, don't be shy and post a comment I'll answer it in no time.

Description:

In this game you'll need to protect your trophy from your opponents by using all kinds of strategies. You can kill them, steal them or even just wait at your base to prevent them from stealing your trophy.
